scripts.buildrh: rimraf .cache dist && parcel build index.html --no-cache --public-url ./ && find .. -maxdepth 1 -type f -not -name 'navigation.json' -delete && cp dist/* .. && cp 301/* .. && rsync -aP --delete --exclude='.git/' --exclude='.cache/' --exclude='dist/' --exclude node_modules /var/www/gundocs/gundb/docs/ /media/sf_gundocs/gundb/docs
